sample_text:
Definition:
EMI: means Equated monthly instalment amount mentioned 
in amortization chart of original loan document pertaining to 
insured vehicle.
Coverage: In consideration of the payment of additional 
premium paid by the Insured and realized by the Company 
not withstanding anything to the contrary contained in the 
Policy, it is hereby understood & agreed that for the purpose 
of this policy Company will pay as per the option mentioned 
in the policy schedule.
1. 	
50% of one EMI
	
If the insured vehicle is kept in garage for accidental 
repairs for more than 6 days, Company will pay an a
